entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
